text: Nischal Basnet (born January 17, 1981) in Kathmandu, Nepal is a Nepali director, producer, actor, dancer and singer of Nepali Film Indsutry. He rose fame from his first movie Loot which was directed by him in 2012 and breaks all the records of the Nepali box office. After that he produce next superhit movie Kabaddi and acted in the same movie and produced the sequal of Kabaddi. After Loot he directed his next movie Talak Jung VS Tulke which was nominated for Oscar Awards. He is one of the top director and famous celebrity of the Nation. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese movie actors Category:Actors from Kathmandu Category:Nepalese movie directors Category:Nepalese movie producers Category:Nepalese singers
title: Nischal Basnet
